name: Happy Birthday Kai-Junior!
description:
Happy Birthday, Kai-Junior! is an action-puzzle game where players control a hatching kaiju monster egg that must roll around destroying a city so that it can fully break open its shell. 

Developed in the Game Studio Capstone at Fitchburg State University, Fall 2016, with a nine person team that was mentored by Ichiro Lambe of Dejobaan Games.

  • Kort Furman: 3D Artist, Level Designer
  • Olivia Horacek: Concept/2D Artist
  • Delton Hulbert: Technical Artist, Producer
  • Randy Perez: 3D Artist
  • Danielle Solomon: Art Director
  • Luis Valle: 3D Artist, Level Designer
  • Sabrina Velez: 3D Artist, Producer
  • Nick Viscione: Writer
  • Nathan Wentworth: Programmer, UI Designer, Producer
